title.jp: Ninja Trainee Shinobu/The Head Master Appears

synopsis: First, ninja trainee Shinobu is sent on a mission by her pervy Head Master to collect underwear from high school girls! Her first target? Kaede Shiranui!

title.jp: Ninjas Elated Over Cherry Blossom Viewing/Shinobu Goes on a Date with Kaede

synopsis: First, rainy weather drives bored ninjas into looking for the Loch Ness Monster in their pond... only to find an Onsokumaru-eating crocodile instead! Then, girl-girl dating?!

title.jp: Onsokumaru Gets Angry/Shinobu Leaves the Manor

synopsis: First, Shinobu's little sister, Miyabi, is a total brat! Onsokumaru decides it's time for a little one-on-one... just her, him, and his crocodile power-suit!

title.jp: Ninjas Hate the Heat/Miyabi in Love

synopsis: First, rising temperatures provide a perfect opportunity for Onsokumaru to get Shinobu and Kaede into in their swimsuits - and hopefully into a lusty embrace as well!

title.jp: Onsokumaru Goes to Hell/The Ninjas Host a Summer Festival

synopsis: First, Onsokumaru gets sent to Hell! But, Hell can't be all that bad! There are demon schoolgirls, demon wives, demon in-laws... Well, the demon in-laws could be kind of bad.

title.jp: A Typhoon Arrives/The Ninjas Go Mushroom Picking

synopsis: First, a typhoon is coming! With Shinobu stuck at Kaede's house, the ninja manor turns into a terrible sausage fest! Witness Onsokumaru's darkest hour!
First, the ball of steel finds himself literally stuck to his arch nemesis, Miyabi! With Onsokumaru melded to her clothes, the gang is in search of a way to detach him.

title.jp: Shinobu in Disguise/A Monster Plant Goes Crazy

synopsis: First, Kaede's school is having a festival, complete with a haunted house! Perhaps Shinobu would make a good addition, but what costume would be the best? A cat girl? An erotic imp?

title.jp: The Girls Get Warm/Kaede Gets Sick

synopsis: First, the infamous hot springs episode! Onsokumaru is foaming at the mouth for a chance to see some skin! Unfortunately, Miyabi's stationed her guardians around the women's bathing area.

title.jp: The Ninjas Have Christmas/The Ninjas Are Cursed

synopsis: First, deck the halls with ninja stars! The ninjas are having their first Christmas ever and it's up to Kaede to teach them about the holiday spirit!

title.jp: The Legend of Sasuke Begins/The Grateful Ninja

synopsis: First, the real star of Ninja Nonsense finally gets his own episode! Expect more explosions, more naked girls, and more full-throttle Sasuke action!
First, the mysterious secret that Onsokumaru alluded to in episode 6 has finally come to light! The shocking truth may change everything for Shinobu...
